# Synopsis

This website contains the teaching materials for DATA 413/613 Data Science, taught at American 
University by [David Gerard](https://dcgerard.github.io/).

# Administrative

- [Syllabus](./admin/syllabus.html)
- [Prerequisites](https://dcgerard.github.io/stat_412_612/): You are expected
  to have already obtained a solid grasp on the materials from Sections 01 to
  09 from my DATA 412/612 teaching website.

- [Final Project Description](./final_project/final_project_description.html)
